item.title: TISC 2022 Level 3 - PATIENT0
item.description: Leaky Matrices Challenge Description This was a forensics challenge unlocked at level 3 that was part of the recent TISC 2022 CTF organised by CSIT. TISC 2022 was an individual CTF that is level-based and not exactly a typical jeopardy-style CTF, meaning that only 1 challenge is released at a time and only after you solve that 1 challenge do you unlock the next one. In this writeup, I will discuss my approach towards solving this particular forensics challenge.
